message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product that I think would be of great interest to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. It's a fantastic opportunity, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10000 for this product. Looking forward to your response!
